questionTitle: Which of the following service offers unlimited storage space?
questionExplanation: Badongo.com is an online software service that enables storage, management and publication of personal content.

questionOption1: In a managed cloud storage system, the user provisions storage on demand
questionOption2: Unmanaged Storage is meant to support virtual cloud computing
questionOption3: In managed storage, the storage service provider makes storage capacity available to users
questionExplanation: User pays for the storage using a pay-as-you-go model in managed cloud storage.

questionTitle: Which of the following service has WebDAV as developer API?
questionExplanation: ADrive provides online cloud storage and backup solutions for personal, business and enterprise-level data.

questionTitle: Which of the following developer API is provided by FilesAnywhere service?
questionExplanation: FilesAnywhere is the creation of Dallas-based software design and consulting firm, Officeware systems.

questionOption1: The most basic service that online storage can serve is to provide disk space on demand
questionOption2: The user may be able to purchase additional space for paid service
questionOption3: S3 is an example of unmanaged cloud storage
questionExplanation: S3 is an example of Managed cloud storage.

questionTitle: Which of the following service is provided by Google for online storage?
questionExplanation: Google Drive is a file storage and synchronization service created by Google.

questionTitle: Which of the following association has coined the term Data Storage as a Service (DaaS) to describe the delivery of storage on demand to clients over a distributed system?
questionExplanation: Others have called these types of system services Storage as a Service (STaaS).

questionTitle: Which of the following are Managed cloud storage providers?
questionExplanation: IBM has both infrastructure and software offerings that allow businesses to create and manage a private storage cloud.

questionTitle: Which of the following is mainly focused on backup and digital archiving, not on storage hosting?
questionExplanation: Iron Mountain Inc., founded in 1951, is an enterprise information management service.

questionTitle: Which of the following offers direct competition to Amazonâ€™s S3 service?
questionExplanation: Unlike other cloud providers, Rackspace only offers managed solutions.
